sentences.en: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.cn: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

sentences.en: And now the drought in Sudan.
Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。

sentences.en: Hundreds of sheep perished that year because of drought.
sentences.cn: 那年由于干旱,几百头羊突然死去.

sentences.en: In fact many food crops failed because of the drought.
sentences.cn: 实际上，因为干旱，很多粮食作物歉收。

sentences.en: Money and food were sent to the impoverished drought victims.
sentences.cn: 给贫困的灾民送去了救济金和粮食.
旱灾造成的焦干的土壤

sentences.en: The drought did a lot of harm to the crops.
sentences.cn: 干旱给庄稼带来许多危害.

sentences.en: The drought has severely disrupted agricultural production.
sentences.cn: 旱灾已严重影响了农业生产。

sentences.en: The ground is as hard as stone after the drought.
sentences.cn: 长期干旱后土地硬得就像石头一样.

sentences.en: The path was dry and slithery from the drought.
sentences.cn: 小路因干旱变得又干又滑。

sentences.en: The paucity of fruit was caused by the drought.
sentences.cn: 水果缺乏是由于干旱造成的.

sentences.en: The plants are growing in again, despite the drought.
sentences.cn: 尽管干旱, 植物又长出来了.

sentences.en: True, the drought is serious, but it can't scare us.
sentences.cn: 旱情诚然是严重的, 但它吓不倒我们.

sentences.en: Water allotments to farmers were cut back in the drought.
sentences.cn: 在干旱时期配给农民的水量减少。
